title: Patch 5.23 brought about one of the biggest buffs for Mordekaiser EVER
body:
Making him 5% taller.

Seriously, he actually looks the part of heavy metal Juggernaut now.

Lack of VU and crappy base stats suck though but hey, at least he seems intimidating.

http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/f/f1/Mordekaiser_Render.png/revision/latest?cb=20141221000514

replies.body: I never realized Mordekaiser had an hourglass figure.
yeah apparently he's a sexy master of metal.  gonna beat your head in and look flawless doing it

Popstar Morde confirmed?

https://38.media.tumblr.com/b37f1c1e0d96623dbd7d52f3f4be8bd6/tumblr_inline_nvo16v5SKI1s9yc5d_500.gif

And childbearing hips...
Mordekaiser=woman confirmed.
He's a beautiful Iron Maiden
[Such devestating beauty!](http://orig03.deviantart.net/fbfd/f/2015/188/e/d/femorde_by_media_drift-d90cpzm.png)

> [{quoted}](name=A Superb Villain,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rvdEAAHN,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-11-25T22:08:10.567+0000)
>
> I never realized Mordekaiser had an hourglass figure.

zhonyas hourglass perhaps?

Imagine if that was a side-effect of using {{item:3157}} too much.
"WARNING: MAY TRANSFORM USER INTO FEMALE. WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY TITS, CLITS, OR FUNNY BITS YOU MAY ENCOUNTER ON YOUR PERSON."

"I never realized Mordekaiser had a Zhonya's figure."
*fixed

> [{quoted}](name=A Superb Villain,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rvdEAAHN,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-11-25T22:08:10.567+0000)
>
> I never realized Mordekaiser had an hourglass figure.

He also has a face and a mouth if you look inside the helmet
*circles cursor around what you just said* This is the best comment on the site.
For a guy who's a suit of armor, he doesn't scale off armor {{champion:54}} {{champion:33}}

{{champion:44}} You guys left me out...


Truly outrageous
{{champion:111}}  also left out and bigger than all three of you combined.
Nautilis doesn't stack off of armor

*Nautilus
"doesn't stack off of armor"
Neither does Mordekaiser, which is the point of the first half of the sentence.

I was talking about how in the original post, he was talking about how unlike Mordekaiser, Malphite and Rammus both scale off of armor. Taric also scales off of armor. Nautilus does not.

I don't know what you're trying to say here

Okay we get it, you like Morde.

You're just trying too hard to stroke your growing e-peen on this now.
we get it you ~~vape~~ play ~~hitler~~ morde
How would one vape hitler?

Burn his corpse and inhale the smoke.
Complain about how he stinks even when he burns.
It's very ironic.

> [{quoted}](name=Isu,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rvdEAAHN,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-11-25T22:39:59.368+0000)
>
> Okay we get it, you like Morde.
> 
> You're just trying too hard to stroke your growing e-peen on this now.

Maybe it's because he's a Morde main? Maybe some people like his posts? Hell, maybe there's even one or two guys who main Morde out there who aren't him? But that's just my two cents.
(Mordekaiser main) Yolo!
{{champion:82}} You only live once, fool!
i dont even really like morde but i like this guys dedication and resilience for the champion. Sona would be my mordekaiser as it is for you

> [{quoted}](name=Isu,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rvdEAAHN,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-11-25T22:39:59.368+0000)
>
> Okay we get it, you like Morde.
> 
> You're just trying too hard to stroke your growing e-peen on this now.

I really don't see the problem with the thread? It's just an (appreciative) joke thread. Joke threads pop up on a daily basis with click bait titles, some of them trying to get a point across while others don't. 

Let malicious be happy that his favorite character isn't actually being ignored like everyone's initial fears. We wouldn't want another cass situation :/.
So. Much. This.
but the pizza feet problem
Dude, that's the source of his true power.
{{champion:44}} is as powerful as Mordekaiser then?
as a toplaner, it works well, if your willing to put in the time to understand his rotation.

> [{quoted}](name=B for Box,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rvdEAAHN,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-11-25T23:11:18.728+0000)
>
> but the pizza feet problem

What if he just has big boobs?
Problem? but Pizza Feet are so useful, why it the most convenient way to carry pizza.

Was the title a pun, by any chance?

If so, stamp of approval.
Needs to be 10% bigger!
I think Mordekaiser is more interesting as a Carry than a Tank

> [{quoted}](name=AquariusGine,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rvdEAAHN,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-11-26T00:16:56.115+0000)
>
> I think Mordekaiser is more interesting as a Carry than a Tank

He **IS** one. If morde was a real juggernaut then he would be op in top lane or even mid. but with the low stats and the high damage of his Q he is more or less one.
The first time I played Morde I butt rushed xin thinking I was in an invincible suit of hulking armor, then my hp disappeared.
Oh yeah If you look closely, you can actually see mordes face. I think he does have a proper one even if he is cast out of his armor.
Mordekaiser could be a model.
damnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnn
I guess this is what Riot meant when they talked about making him more tanky.
Pizzzzzaa...iron pizzzzaaaaa {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
